de.javasoft.swing.plaf
Class UIValue<T>

java.lang.Object
  de.javasoft.swing.plaf.UIValue<T>

public class UIValue<T>
extends java.lang.Object

Convenient property wrapper for components to hold UI properties which should also be configurable by the used LAF.

Version:
1.00, 01.03.2009
See Also:
IUIPropertySupport, WidgetUtils.setUIProperty(javax.swing.JComponent, String, UIValue, Object, Object, boolean, boolean, boolean)
